channel.title: Tram Ride
channel.description: This isn't as much of a glitch as much as something that's been bothering me. On the tram ride, when you jump, you move backward (technically, you stay in place relative to the map, but whatever.) I've seen staying in place when jumping on moving objects done in other source games. (not implying it's easy. It's probably 100x more difficult than I imagine. If it isn't worth developer resources & time, ignore this)

item.title: Tram Ride
item.dc:creator: Slendgy
item.description:
This isn’t as much of a glitch as much as something that’s been bothering me. On the tram ride, when you jump, you move backward (technically, you stay in place relative to the map, but whatever.) I’ve seen staying in place when jumping on moving objects done in other source games. (not implying it’s easy. It’s probably 100x more difficult than I imagine. If it isn’t worth developer resources & time, ignore this)
